reviews.review: Muito bom para quem gosta de jogar com os amigos

This gmae is just fantastic, every class have their very own play style. This game is easy to learn, but hard to master, I can play this game all day long :D

Team Fortress 2 is a team based first person shooter, which involves 2 teams of both red and blue mercenaries, who are put up against each other. With 9 unique classes and tons of different playstyles due to the different weapon combinations, this game is innovative and yet somewhat familiar. If that aspect of the game dosen't tickle your fancy, then you can alternate to trading: Much like a completely different game, you can trade for cool items and hats or to make profit up to thousands of dollars. Get a reputation and get well known for your good trades and items and you will soon find yourself at home in Team Fortress 2

Gaming aspect: 7/10, could use more new maps and more balanced weapon combos, none the less allright
Trading aspext: 9/10, Great friendly community and fun items to trade with, the reason i give it a 9 is because of the many restrictions for trading, but this is more overall steam and pulls down any trading game!
It kills your bank with every new update.

Even if this game was released on 2007, it's still one of the most addicting game I've ever played. Best of all, it's free! Just try tto avoid buying microtransaction (Although to play competitive mode you need to buy something on the store, I think)

Team Fortress 2 is not like any other first person shooter. With a perfect blend of strategy, unique classes, and different gamemodes, TF2 is truly a game of its own. It is by far the best free-to-play game on Steam in my opinion. Team Fortress 2 is an all around great game that I would reccommend to anyone who is looking for a unique, affordable, and high-quality game.
Muinto bom bem feito divertido e muinto visiante

Thos just a cool game. You can play with your friends via party. And ther are also alot of funny things for you to find out and enjoy them. With many different mode.  And if you want to make friends more than killing them you can do that in the community servers.

I was hard to start up i often started in single player agenst bots but once you find your class stick with it, i only hate the crafting aspect of the game all the weapons i had to destroy to get the best pyro load out.
I like This Game Very Much And This Game is Secured Thank you For making this Game <3.
Very good and well made game

I've had countless hours of fun as an F2Per Pyro/Scout dual main and have had no qualms about the F2P system. I've got no complaints here.

I played this game, and the moment I did, I became a better Mann. All the ladies loved how I had transformed from a flimsy piece of radiated bread into a rocksolid Mann, so I then became a ladies-mann. Play TF2 to have the ladies want to be you or want you.
